snippet.title: Drag'n'Boom – The Minigame that Will Get You All Fired Up!
snippet.description:
Get ready to set the roof on fire with this new mobile minigame by Ankama!
Play on iPhone and iPad: https://goo.gl/ykM4jk
Play on Android: https://goo.gl/55d1Ef

A ginormous pile of gold for a bed – that's what every dragon's dreams are made of! But these winged creatures know all too well that such treasures never fall ready-cooked into their flaming maws…
You gotta work for it! In Drag'n'Boom, take control of a rebellious teenage dragon ready to do anything it takes to become rich and famous by collecting gold and precious jewels. Scare nearby lords with flare and originality, and you might become the Tony Hawk of the medieval era! 

Find all of Ankama's universes on https://www.ankama.com/en and in the free Gamakna e-magazine!

Subscribe to the channel:  
https://www.youtube.com/user/MyAnkamaEN/playlists?flow=grid&shelf_id=4&view=50
